verses.verse: הַדָּבָ֛ר <WH1697> The word אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> which הָיָ֥ה <WH1961> came אֶֽל־ <WH413> to יִרְמְיָ֖הוּ <WH3414> which came unto Jeremiah מֵאֵ֣ת <WH853> יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> from the LORD בִּימֵ֨י <WH3117> in the days יְהוֹיָקִ֧ים <WH3079> of Jehoiakim בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son יֹאשִׁיָּ֛הוּ <WH2977> of Josiah מֶ֥לֶךְ <WH4428> king יְהוּדָ֖ה <WH3063> of Judah לֵאמֹֽר׃ <WH559> saying

הָלוֹךְ֮ <WH1980> Go אֶל־ <WH413> to בֵּ֣ית <WH1004> unto the house הָרֵכָבִים֒ <WH7397> of the Rechabites וְדִבַּרְתָּ֣ <WH1696> and speak אוֹתָ֔ם <WH853> וַהֲבִֽאוֹתָם֙ <WH935> unto them and bring בֵּ֣ית <WH1004> them into the house יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> of the LORD אֶל־ <WH413> into אַחַ֖ת <WH259> into one הַלְּשָׁכ֑וֹת <WH3957> of the chambers וְהִשְׁקִיתָ֥ <WH8248> to drink אוֹתָ֖ם <WH853> יָֽיִן׃ <WH3196> and give them wine

וָאֶקַּ֞ח <WH3947> Then I took אֶת־ <WH853> יַאֲזַנְיָ֤ה <WH2970> Jaazaniah בֶֽן־ <WH1121> the son יִרְמְיָ֙הוּ֙ <WH3414> of Jeremiah בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son חֲבַצִּנְיָ֔ה <WH2262> of Habaziniah וְאֶת־ <WH853> אֶחָ֖יו <WH251> and his brethren וְאֶת־ <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> and all בָּנָ֑יו <WH1121> and all his sons וְאֵ֖ת <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> and the whole בֵּ֥ית <WH1004> and the whole house הָרֵכָבִֽים׃ <WH7397> of the Rechabites

וָאָבִ֤א <WH935> And I brought אֹתָם֙ <WH853> בֵּ֣ית <WH1004> them into the house יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> of the LORD אֶל־ <WH413> into לִשְׁכַּ֗ת <WH3957> into the chamber בְּנֵ֛י <WH1121> of the sons חָנָ֥ן <WH2605> of Hanan בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son יִגְדַּלְיָ֖הוּ <WH3012> of Igdaliah אִ֣ישׁ <WH376> a man הָאֱלֹהִ֑ים <WH430> of God אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> which אֵ֙צֶל֙ <WH681> which [was] by לִשְׁכַּ֣ת <WH3957> the chamber הַשָּׂרִ֔ים <WH8269> of the princes אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> which מִמַּ֗עַל <WH4605> which [was] above לְלִשְׁכַּ֛ת <WH3957> the chamber מַעֲשֵׂיָ֥הוּ <WH4641> of Maaseiah בֶן־ <WH1121> the son שַׁלֻּ֖ם <WH7967> of Shallum שֹׁמֵ֥ר <WH8104> the keeper הַסַּֽף׃ <WH5592> of the door

וָאֶתֵּ֞ן <WH5414> And I set לִפְנֵ֣י ׀ <WH6440> before בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> the sons בֵית־ <WH1004> of the house הָרֵכָבִ֗ים <WH7397> of the Rechabites גְּבִעִ֛ים <WH1375> pots מְלֵאִ֥ים <WH4392> full יַ֖יִן <WH3196> of wine וְכֹס֑וֹת <WH3563> and cups וָאֹמַ֥ר <WH559> and I said אֲלֵיהֶ֖ם <WH413> to שְׁתוּ־ <WH8354> unto them Drink יָֽיִן׃ <WH3196> ye wine

וַיֹּאמְר֖וּ <WH559> But they said לֹ֣א <WH3808> We will not נִשְׁתֶּה־ <WH8354> We will drink יָּ֑יִן <WH3196> no wine כִּי֩ <WH3588> for יוֹנָדָ֨ב <WH3122> for Jonadab בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son רֵכָ֜ב <WH7394> of Rechab אָבִ֗ינוּ <WH1> our father צִוָּ֤ה <WH6680> commanded עָלֵ֙ינוּ֙ <WH5921> and לֵאמֹ֔ר <WH559> us saying לֹ֧א <WH3808> shall not תִשְׁתּוּ־ <WH8354> Ye shall drink יַ֛יִן <WH3196> no wine אַתֶּ֥ם <WH859> you וּבְנֵיכֶ֖ם <WH1121> [neither ye] nor your sons עַד־ <WH5704> for עוֹלָֽם׃ <WH5769> ever

וּבַ֣יִת <WH1004> house לֹֽא־ <WH3808> shall not תִבְנ֗וּ <WH1129> Neither shall ye build וְזֶ֤רַע <WH2233> seed לֹֽא־ <WH3808> shall not תִזְרָ֙עוּ֙ <WH2232> nor sow וְכֶ֣רֶם <WH3754> vineyard לֹֽא־ <WH3808> shall not תִטָּ֔עוּ <WH5193> nor plant וְלֹ֥א <WH3808> or יִֽהְיֶ֖ה <WH1961> own לָכֶ֑ם כִּ֠י <WH3588> in בָּאֳהָלִ֤ים <WH168> in tents תֵּֽשְׁבוּ֙ <WH3427> ye shall dwell כָּל־ <WH3605> all יְמֵיכֶ֔ם <WH3117> nor have [any] but all your days לְמַ֨עַן <WH4616> that תִּֽחְי֜וּ <WH2421> that ye may live יָמִ֤ים <WH3117> days רַבִּים֙ <WH7227> many עַל־ <WH5921> and פְּנֵ֣י <WH6440> in הָאֲדָמָ֔ה <WH127> the land אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> after אַתֶּ֖ם <WH859> where גָּרִ֥ים <WH1481> where ye [be] strangers שָֽׁם׃ <WH8033> We

וַנִּשְׁמַ֗ע <WH8085> Thus have we obeyed בְּק֨וֹל <WH6963> the voice יְהוֹנָדָ֤ב <WH3082> of Jonadab בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son רֵכָב֙ <WH7394> of Rechab אָבִ֔ינוּ <WH1> our father לְכֹ֖ל <WH3605> all אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> he צִוָּ֑נוּ <WH6680> in all that he hath charged לְבִלְתִּ֤י <WH1115> not שְׁתֽוֹת־ <WH8354> us to drink יַ֙יִן֙ <WH3196> no wine כָּל־ <WH3605> all יָמֵ֔ינוּ <WH3117> all our days אֲנַ֣חְנוּ <WH587> we נָשֵׁ֔ינוּ <WH802> we our wives בָּנֵ֖ינוּ <WH1121> our sons וּבְנֹתֵֽינוּ׃ <WH1323> nor our daughters

וּלְבִלְתִּ֛י <WH1115> nor בְּנ֥וֹת <WH1129> Nor to build בָּתִּ֖ים <WH1004> houses לְשִׁבְתֵּ֑נוּ <WH3427> for us to dwell in וְכֶ֧רֶם <WH3754> neither have we vineyard וְשָׂדֶ֛ה <WH7704> nor field וָזֶ֖רַע <WH2233> nor seed לֹ֥א <WH3808> not יִֽהְיֶה־ <WH1961> have לָּֽנוּ׃

וַנֵּ֖שֶׁב <WH3427> But we have dwelt in בָּֽאֳהָלִ֑ים <WH168> tents וַנִּשְׁמַ֣ע <WH8085> and have obeyed וַנַּ֔עַשׂ <WH6213> and done כְּכֹ֥ל <WH3605> to all אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> after צִוָּ֖נוּ <WH6680> commanded יוֹנָדָ֥ב <WH3122> according to all that Jonadab אָבִֽינוּ׃ <WH1> our father

וַיְהִ֗י <WH1961> become בַּעֲל֨וֹת <WH5927> came up נְבוּכַדְרֶאצַּ֥ר <WH5019> But it came to pass when Nebuchadrezzar מֶֽלֶךְ־ <WH4428> king בָּבֶל֮ <WH894> of Babylon אֶל־ <WH413> against הָאָרֶץ֒ <WH776> into the land וַנֹּ֗אמֶר <WH559> that we said בֹּ֚אוּ <WH935> Come וְנָב֣וֹא <WH935> and let us go יְרוּשָׁלִַ֔ם <WH3389> to Jerusalem מִפְּנֵי֙ <WH6440> for fear חֵ֣יל <WH2428> of the army הַכַּשְׂדִּ֔ים <WH3778> of the Chaldeans וּמִפְּנֵ֖י <WH6440> and for fear חֵ֣יל <WH2428> of the army אֲרָ֑ם <WH758> of the Syrians וַנֵּ֖שֶׁב <WH3427> so we dwell בִּירוּשָׁלִָֽם׃ <WH3389> at Jerusalem פ
וַֽיְהִי֙ <WH1961> came דְּבַר־ <WH1697> Then came the word יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> of the LORD אֶֽל־ <WH413> to יִרְמְיָ֖הוּ <WH3414> unto Jeremiah לֵאמֹֽר׃ <WH559> saying

כֹּֽה־ <WH3541> Thus אָמַ֞ר <WH559> Thus saith יְהוָ֤ה <WH3069> God צְבָאוֹת֙ <WH6635> of hosts אֱלֹהֵ֣י <WH430> the God יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> of Israel הָלֹ֤ךְ <WH1980> Go וְאָֽמַרְתָּ֙ <WH559> and tell לְאִ֣ישׁ <WH376> the men יְהוּדָ֔ה <WH3063> of Judah וּלְיֽוֹשְׁבֵ֖י <WH3427> and the inhabitants יְרֽוּשָׁלִָ֑ם <WH3389> of Jerusalem הֲל֨וֹא <WH3808> not תִקְח֥וּ <WH3947> Will ye not receive מוּסָ֛ר <WH4148> instruction לִשְׁמֹ֥עַ <WH8085> to hearken אֶל־ <WH413> about דְּבָרַ֖י <WH1697> act נְאֻם־ <WH5002> said יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3069> God

הוּקַ֡ם <WH6965> are performed אֶת־ <WH853> דִּבְרֵ֣י <WH1697> The words יְהוֹנָדָ֣ב <WH3082> of Jonadab בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son רֵ֠כָב <WH7394> of Rechab אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> which צִוָּ֨ה <WH6680> that he commanded אֶת־ <WH853> בָּנָ֜יו <WH1121> his sons לְבִלְתִּ֣י <WH1115> not שְׁתֽוֹת־ <WH8354> not to drink יַ֗יִן <WH3196> wine וְלֹ֤א <WH3808> not שָׁתוּ֙ <WH8354> they drink עַד־ <WH5704> against הַיּ֣וֹם <WH3117> for unto this day הַזֶּ֔ה <WH2088> this כִּ֣י <WH3588> for שָֽׁמְע֔וּ <WH8085> none but obey אֵ֖ת <WH853> מִצְוַ֣ת <WH4687> commandment אֲבִיהֶ֑ם <WH1> their father's וְאָ֨נֹכִ֜י <WH595> I דִּבַּ֤רְתִּי <WH1696> notwithstanding I have spoken אֲלֵיכֶם֙ <WH413> to you הַשְׁכֵּ֣ם <WH7925> unto you rising early וְדַבֵּ֔ר <WH1696> and speaking וְלֹ֥א <WH3808> have not שְׁמַעְתֶּ֖ם <WH8085> but ye hearkened אֵלָֽי׃ <WH413> to

וָאֶשְׁלַ֣ח <WH7971> I have sent אֲלֵיכֶ֣ם <WH413> about אֶת־ <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> all עֲבָדַ֣י <WH5650> also unto you all my servants הַנְּבִאִ֣ים ׀ <WH5030> the prophets הַשְׁכֵּ֣ים <WH7925> rising up early וְשָׁלֹ֣חַ ׀ <WH7971> and sending לֵאמֹ֡ר <WH559> [them] saying שֻׁבוּ־ <WH7725> Return נָ֡א <WH4994> now אִישׁ֩ <WH376> ye now every man מִדַּרְכּ֨וֹ <WH1870> way הָרָעָ֜ה <WH7451> from his evil וְהֵיטִ֣יבוּ <WH3190> and amend מַֽעַלְלֵיכֶ֗ם <WH4611> your doings וְאַל־ <WH408> not תֵּ֨לְכ֜וּ <WH1980> go אַחֲרֵ֨י <WH310> not after אֱלֹהִ֤ים <WH430> gods אֲחֵרִים֙ <WH312> other לְעָבְדָ֔ם <WH5647> to serve וּשְׁבוּ֙ <WH3427> them and ye shall dwell in אֶל־ <WH413> in הָ֣אֲדָמָ֔ה <WH127> the land אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> which נָתַ֥תִּי <WH5414> which I have given לָכֶ֖ם וְלַאֲבֹֽתֵיכֶ֑ם <WH1> to you and to your fathers וְלֹ֤א <WH3808> have not הִטִּיתֶם֙ <WH5186> but ye have not inclined אֶֽת־ <WH853> אָזְנְכֶ֔ם <WH241> your ear וְלֹ֥א <WH3808> or שְׁמַעְתֶּ֖ם <WH8085> nor hearkened אֵלָֽי׃ <WH413> about

כִּ֣י <WH3588> Indeed הֵקִ֗ימוּ <WH6965> have performed בְּנֵי֙ <WH1121> Because the sons יְהוֹנָדָ֣ב <WH3082> of Jonadab בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son רֵכָ֔ב <WH7394> of Rechab אֶת־ <WH853> מִצְוַ֥ת <WH4687> the commandment אֲבִיהֶ֖ם <WH1> of their father אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> which צִוָּ֑ם <WH6680> which he commanded וְהָעָ֣ם <WH5971> them but this people הַזֶּ֔ה <WH2088> this לֹ֥א <WH3808> has not שָׁמְע֖וּ <WH8085> hath not hearkened אֵלָֽי׃ <WH413> about ס

לָ֠כֵן <WH3651> Therefore כֹּֽה־ <WH3541> thus אָמַ֨ר <WH559> Therefore thus saith יְהוָ֜ה <WH3068> the LORD אֱלֹהֵ֤י <WH430> God צְבָאוֹת֙ <WH6635> of hosts אֱלֹהֵ֣י <WH430> the God יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> of Israel הִנְנִ֧י <WH2005> behold מֵבִ֣יא <WH935> Behold I will bring אֶל־ <WH413> on יְהוּדָ֗ה <WH3063> upon Judah וְאֶ֤ל <WH413> and on כָּל־ <WH3605> all יֽוֹשְׁבֵי֙ <WH3427> and upon all the inhabitants יְר֣וּשָׁלִַ֔ם <WH3389> of Jerusalem אֵ֚ת <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> all הָ֣רָעָ֔ה <WH7451> all the evil אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> i דִּבַּ֖רְתִּי <WH1696> that I have pronounced עֲלֵיהֶ֑ם <WH5921> against יַ֣עַן <WH3282> because דִּבַּ֤רְתִּי <WH1696> against them because I have spoken אֲלֵיהֶם֙ <WH413> about וְלֹ֣א <WH3808> did not שָׁמֵ֔עוּ <WH8085> unto them but they have not heard וָאֶקְרָ֥א <WH7121> and I have called לָהֶ֖ם וְלֹ֥א <WH3808> have not עָנֽוּ׃ <WH6030> unto them but they have not answered

וּלְבֵ֨ית <WH1004> unto the house הָרֵכָבִ֜ים <WH7397> of the Rechabites אָמַ֣ר <WH559> said יִרְמְיָ֗הוּ <WH3414> And Jeremiah כֹּֽה־ <WH3541> Thus אָמַ֞ר <WH559> Thus saith יְהוָ֤ה <WH3068> the LORD צְבָאוֹת֙ <WH6635> of hosts אֱלֹהֵ֣י <WH430> the God יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> of Israel יַ֚עַן <WH3282> because אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> you שְׁמַעְתֶּ֔ם <WH8085> Because ye have obeyed עַל־ <WH5921> and מִצְוַ֖ת <WH4687> the commandment יְהוֹנָדָ֣ב <WH3082> of Jonadab אֲבִיכֶ֑ם <WH1> your father וַֽתִּשְׁמְרוּ֙ <WH8104> and kept אֶת־ <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> all מִצְוֹתָ֔יו <WH4687> all his precepts וַֽתַּעֲשׂ֔וּ <WH6213> and done כְּכֹ֥ל <WH3605> to all אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> he צִוָּ֖ה <WH6680> according unto all that he hath commanded אֶתְכֶֽם׃ <WH853> ס

לָכֵ֗ן <WH3651> therefore כֹּ֥ה <WH3541> thus אָמַ֛ר <WH559> Therefore thus saith יְהוָ֥ה <WH3068> the LORD צְבָא֖וֹת <WH6635> of hosts אֱלֹהֵ֣י <WH430> the God יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <WH3478> of Israel לֹֽא־ <WH3808> shall not יִכָּרֵ֨ת <WH3772> shall not want אִ֜ישׁ <WH376> a man לְיוֹנָדָ֧ב <WH3122> Jonadab בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son רֵכָ֛ב <WH7394> of Rechab עֹמֵ֥ד <WH5975> to stand לְפָנַ֖י <WH6440> before כָּל־ <WH3605> for הַיָּמִֽים׃ <WH3117> me for ever פ
